name: Thirteenth row on the plane
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-1-task-3.png)

The number 13 is considered unlucky in many countries, and the fear of the number 13 is called triskaidekaphobia.
For example, many passenger airplanes do not have a thirteenth row.

Create a variable named `isRow12` and assign it the value `true`.

Create a variable named `isRow13` and assign it the value `false`.

Here is an example that is fundamentally similar to what you need to do,
but adapt it to the requirements of the task:
```
const isGold = true;
```
